column2: Periodically grants regeneration and removes conditions from you and your allies.

Use the trident to create random attacks.
50%% chance to damage and bleed foes with a rock blade.
50%% chance to damage and knock back a single foe with a water missile.
<c=@abilitytype>Shout.</c> Cure a condition on yourself and nearby allies. Also breaks stuns.
<c=@abilitytype>Arcane.</c> Block attacks with an energy shield. If it blocks three attacks, it explodes for critical damage.
Release a fiery phoenix that attacks foes in a line before exploding and returning to you, curing a condition and granting you vigor.

Siphon health from nearby enemies over time, gaining vitality each time you hit an enemy.
<c=@reminder>Players struck by this ability lose equivalent vitality.</c>
Engage the Hazmat suit's self-repair mechanism, healing yourself at a constant rate up to the threshold.
You deal 25%% more damage and move faster.
Smash the ground with your mace, damaging your target and sending out a shock wave that damages and knocks down foes.

Thanks for helping to get our supplies back. Here, take something you need from them."
—Quennida"

Tending the wall often causes damage to armor. Select a replacment from our stores to keep your defenses strong."
—Viner Neit "

These won't rescue you from the Risen, but they will offer you some extra protection."
—Danu"

Altruism is all well and good, but have you forgotten that the Snaff Prize competition is underway? This is for the most prestigious title an inventor can earn, so we need you to do your part for the College of Synergetics and help demonstrate our teleportation device. Time is growing short, and so is my patience (and if you use that to make any cracks about my height, you're fired). Get over to the parade grounds near Obscura Incline and wear your most convincing smile!
—Varkk, Genius
The Snaff Prize Must Be Ours
Time To Win Us A Snaff Prize
Double-click to summon a personal Black Lion Delivery Agent for 5 minutes, allowing you to pick up trading post purchases and profits. Reusable.
Maul your foes and make them bleed.
Jab your foe with your tusks.

Offense and defense. Both are needed to be triumphant."
—Enduring Protector"

These have a special filter to handle all the tar."
—Engineer Verutum"
Double-click to summon a personal Black Lion Merchant for 5 minutes, allowing you to access basic supplies and sell loot. Reusable.
Press and hold to turn your cannon to the right
Press and hold to turn your cannon to the left.
Press and hold to fire a cannonball.
Double-click to access your account bank from anywhere. Reusable.
Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.
Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.
Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.
Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.
Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.
Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.
Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.
Urgent: Problem With Your Golem Design
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Burst the orb, instantly healing your allies and creating an area of continual healing.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Burst the orb, instantly healing your allies and creating an area of continual healing.

A recollection of the life and deeds of Mad King Thorn, as recounted by his loyal subjects and friends. The volume ends with the coronation of King Thorn. It seems incomplete.
—Stories yet untold despite the tower that marks a spooky site. When humans flee their home of old, where they settle cannot be told.

A recollection of the life and deeds of Mad King Thorn, as told by his loyal subjects and friends. Contains a complete account of King Oswald Thorn's life, from boyhood to gruesome death.
Even after death, I shall return! And all my enemies will burn, burn, BURN!"
—Mad King Thorn"
